ComicInfo.Title: At Long Last--Ragnarok?!
ComicInfo.Summary: At Long Last--Ragnarok?!: All of the prophecies of Ragnarok seem to be coming true. The new Thor is convinced by Sif to join the old Thor to protect Asgard and pays with his life.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:32:05. [Issue ID 32875]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Hela,Trolls,Heimdall,Harris Hobbs (reporter),Fenris,Loki,Volstagg],Odin,The Warriors Three [Fandral,Sigyn,Balder,Hogun,Sif,Thor [Roger "Red" Norvell] (death),Thor,The Midgard Serpent,Hoder
